languages.text: "Все просто. Каждый игрок получает вслепую несколько плиток. Плитки соединяют маг-линии, вариантов соединений очень много. Получается узор определенного достоинства, у кого он дороже — тот и победил". {n}Тараторя правила и варианты комбинаций, Джай невесомыми движениями тасует колоду плиток.{/n}

"It's easy. Every player is dealt a few tiles. The tiles are connected by mag-lines, and there are lots of possible combinations. You arrange the tiles in a design that has a particular value, and whoever has the highest value wins." {n}Talking a mile a minute about the rules and tile combinations, Jae deftly shuffles the stack of tiles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Все просто. Каждый игрок получает вслепую несколько плиток. Плитки соединяют маг-линии, вариантов соединений очень много. Получается узор определенного достоинства, у кого он дороже — тот и победил". {n}Тараторя правила и варианты комбинаций, Джай невесомыми движениями тасует колоду плиток.{/n}

You arrange the tiles in a design that has a particular value, and whoever has the highest value wins." {n}Talking a mile a minute about the rules and tile combinations, Jae deftly shuffles the stack of tiles.{/n}

languages.text: “规则很简单，每个玩家都会拿到几张牌，你可以把这些牌上的磁线拼成特定的图案。有很多图案可以拼，不同的图案分数不同。最后谁分数最高，谁就赢了。”{n}婕伊滔滔不绝地介绍着游戏规则，告诉你都有哪些图案，随后灵巧地洗好了牌。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's easy. Every player is dealt a few tiles. The tiles are connected by mag-lines, and there are lots of possible combinations. You arrange the tiles in a design that has a particular value, and whoever has the highest value wins." {n}Talking a mile a minute about the rules and tile combinations, Jae deftly shuffles the stack of tiles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “规则很简单，每个玩家都会拿到几张牌，你可以把这些牌上的磁线拼成特定的图案。有很多图案可以拼，不同的图案分数不同。最后谁分数最高，谁就赢了。”{n}婕伊滔滔不绝地介绍着游戏规则，告诉你都有哪些图案，随后灵巧地洗好了牌。{/n}

languages.text: 「簡単だよ。すべてのプレイヤーに数枚のタイルが配られる。タイルはマグラインでつながっていて、たくさんの組み合わせが考えられる。タイルをある特定の値になるように並べて、一番高い値で揃えた人の勝ちってわけ」{n}ルールとタイルの組み合わせについて矢継ぎ早に話しながら、ジェイは手際よくタイルの山をシャッフルする。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's easy. Every player is dealt a few tiles. The tiles are connected by mag-lines, and there are lots of possible combinations. You arrange the tiles in a design that has a particular value, and whoever has the highest value wins." {n}Talking a mile a minute about the rules and tile combinations, Jae deftly shuffles the stack of tiles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「簡単だよ。すべてのプレイヤーに数枚のタイルが配られる。タイルはマグラインでつながっていて、たくさんの組み合わせが考えられる。タイルをある特定の値になるように並べて、一番高い値で揃えた人の勝ちってわけ」{n}ルールとタイルの組み合わせについて矢継ぎ早に話しながら、ジェイは手際よくタイルの山をシャッフルする。{/n}

languages.text: «Es sencillo. Cada jugador recibe una serie de fichas. Están conectadas por líneas magnéticas y hay numerosas combinaciones. Es cuestión de organizar las fichas para crear un diseño con un cierto valor. Quien tenga la puntuación más alta, gana». {n}Hablando con la velocidad del rayo sobre reglas y combinaciones, Jae baraja con mano experta las fichas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's easy. Every player is dealt a few tiles. The tiles are connected by mag-lines, and there are lots of possible combinations. You arrange the tiles in a design that has a particular value, and whoever has the highest value wins." {n}Talking a mile a minute about the rules and tile combinations, Jae deftly shuffles the stack of tiles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es sencillo. Cada jugador recibe una serie de fichas. Están conectadas por líneas magnéticas y hay numerosas combinaciones. Es cuestión de organizar las fichas para crear un diseño con un cierto valor. Quien tenga la puntuación más alta, gana». {n}Hablando con la velocidad del rayo sobre reglas y combinaciones, Jae baraja con mano experta las fichas.{/n}

languages.text: « Ça n'a rien de compliqué. Chaque joueur reçoit une poignée de tuiles. Ces tuiles sont reliées par des lignes magnétiques, que vous pouvez associer de multiples façons afin de créer un motif. L'alignement ainsi créé rapporte des points, et le score le plus élevé l'emporte. » {n}Tout en mélangeant les tuiles, Jae vous explique les règles et les différentes combinaisons possibles à toute vitesse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's easy. Every player is dealt a few tiles. The tiles are connected by mag-lines, and there are lots of possible combinations. You arrange the tiles in a design that has a particular value, and whoever has the highest value wins." {n}Talking a mile a minute about the rules and tile combinations, Jae deftly shuffles the stack of tiles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ça n'a rien de compliqué. Chaque joueur reçoit une poignée de tuiles. Ces tuiles sont reliées par des lignes magnétiques, que vous pouvez associer de multiples façons afin de créer un motif. L'alignement ainsi créé rapporte des points, et le score le plus élevé l'emporte. » {n}Tout en mélangeant les tuiles, Jae vous explique les règles et les différentes combinaisons possibles à toute vitesse.{/n}

languages.text: "Es ist ganz einfach. Jeder Spieler bekommt ein paar Steine. Die Spielsteine sind durch Mag-Linien miteinander verbunden, wodurch sich viele Kombinationsmöglichkeiten ergeben. Man muss die Spielsteine so anordnen, dass sie einen bestimmten Wert erreichen, und wer den höchsten Wert hat, gewinnt." {n}Während Jae über die Regeln und Steinkombinationen fabuliert, mischt sie geschickt den Steinstapel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's easy. Every player is dealt a few tiles. The tiles are connected by mag-lines, and there are lots of possible combinations. You arrange the tiles in a design that has a particular value, and whoever has the highest value wins." {n}Talking a mile a minute about the rules and tile combinations, Jae deftly shuffles the stack of tiles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ganz einfach. Jeder Spieler bekommt ein paar Steine. Die Spielsteine sind durch Mag-Linien miteinander verbunden, wodurch sich viele Kombinationsmöglichkeiten ergeben. Man muss die Spielsteine so anordnen, dass sie einen bestimmten Wert erreichen, und wer den höchsten Wert hat, gewinnt." {n}Während Jae über die Regeln und Steinkombinationen fabuliert, mischt sie geschickt den Steinstapel.{/n}

languages.text: "Çok kolay. Her oyuncuya birkaç karo dağıtılır. Karolar, mıknatıslı çizgilerle birbirine bağlanır. Bir sürü potansiyel kombinasyon vardır. Karoları belli bir değere sahip olacak şekilde düzenlersin ve en yüksek değeri elinde bulunduran kazanır." {n}Kurallardan ve karo kombinasyonlarından uzun uzun bahsettikten sonra Jae hızlı bir şekilde karoları karıştırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It's easy. Every player is dealt a few tiles. The tiles are connected by mag-lines, and there are lots of possible combinations. You arrange the tiles in a design that has a particular value, and whoever has the highest value wins." {n}Talking a mile a minute about the rules and tile combinations, Jae deftly shuffles the stack of tiles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Çok kolay. Her oyuncuya birkaç karo dağıtılır. Karolar mıknatıslı çizgilerle birbirine bağlanır ve bir sürü potansiyel kombinasyon vardır. Karoları belli bir değere sahip olacak şekilde düzenlersin ve en yüksek değere sahip olan kazanır." {n}Kurallardan ve karo kombinasyonlarından uzun uzun bahsettikten sonra Jae hızlı bir şekilde karoları karıştırıyor.{/n}
